page.title: 14FARMING 1
page.content: {BRICKYARD FARM ON DAVE NORMAN'S DAIRY FARM THERE ARE LOTS OF FRESIAN COWS.THERE IS ONE BULL AND SOME GUERNSY COWS.I TASTED THE MILK OF THE GUERNSY AND FRESIAN COWS.THE GUERNSEY COWS MILK IS VERY CREAMY AND THE FRESIAN COWS MILK TASTES JUST LIKE THE MILK I DRINK AT HOME.I HAVE WATCHED COWS BEING MILKED IN THE MILKING PARLOUR.THE MILKING MACHINE SUCKS ALL THE MILK FROM THE UDDERS. ON THE FARM THERE ARE 81 COWS,30 HEIFERS,26 CALVES,AND ONE BULL.THE COWS ARE MILKED TWICE A DAY. THE FARM HAS BEEN IN EXISTANCE FOR AS LONG AS ANYONE CAN REMEMBER.
